featured.text: If you put a ______ under a leaking faucet, you will be surprised at the amount of water collected in 24 hours.
A gas leak one month later caused an explosion in the lights, injuring the policeman operating it.

definition.zh_def: 洩漏，漏出；指液體、氣體或信息的不當流出或洩漏。
definition.en_def: To allow liquid, gas, or information to escape from a container or to be disclosed unintentionally.
definition.example: There was a leak in the pipe, causing water to drip onto the floor.
